name: Get_Room_List

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children_age.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

room_qty.description: The number of rooms that are required. The default value is set to 1.

units.description: The measurement of distance in metric or imperial.

temperature_unit.description:
The temperature unit in Fahrenheit or Celsius.
c = Celsius
f = Fahrenheit

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

location.description: location can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLocations(Get Location) endpoint in Meta collection.

cribs_and_extra_beds.text: The price in INR has been converted to show you the approximate price in USD.
Supplements are not calculated automatically in the total costs and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
The maximum number of cots, extra beds and children allowed in existing beds may vary depending on the option you book.

children_at_the_property.text: Children of any age are welcome.
Children 12 years and above will be charged as adults at this property.
To see correct prices and occupancy information, please add the number of children in your group and their ages to your search.

7471721.description:
These sea-facing suites offer views of the Arabian Sea. With a living area, bedroom and a marble-finished bathroom with a tub, these suites also feature a balcony that overlooks the Gateway of India. 

The suites include:
- Access to buffet breakfast at the Sea Lounge
- High-tea at the Palace Lounge from 15:00 to 17:00
- Daily evening cocktail hours at the Palace Lounge from 18:00 to 19:00
- Service of hot and soft beverages at the Palace Lounge from 07:00 to 23:00
- Complimentary one-way airport transfer 
- Ironing for two pieces of garments per stay
- Convenience of early check-in (post 09:00) and late check-out (until 18:00) (subject to availability)
- A two-hour complimentry access to a meeting room at the business center per stay (subject to availability with prior reservation)

children_at_the_property.text: Children of any age are welcome.
Children 12 years and above will be charged as adults at this property.
To see correct prices and occupancy information, please add the number of children in your group and their ages to your search.

7471725.description: Offering free toiletries and bathrobes, this triple room includes a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, a bidet and a hairdryer. The air-conditioned triple room offers a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a tea and coffee maker, a safe deposit box as well as city views. The unit offers 1 bed.

The air-conditioned triple room offers a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a tea and coffee maker, a safe deposit box as well as sea views. The unit offers 1 bed.

response_summary:
The API response provides detailed information about hotel room options available for booking in Mumbai, with check-in on June 10, 2025, and check-out on June 15, 2025. Here's a summary of the key details:

### Room Options:
1. **Superior Room Sea View King Bed (Single Occupancy)**
   - **Price:** Approximately **$765** (₹65,450) for the stay, excluding taxes and charges.
   - **Cancellation Policy:** Free cancellation until **June 8, 2025**. After that, a prepayment of the first night's cost is required.
   - **Meal Plan:** Breakfast included. Lunch and dinner available for an additional **$58** each.
   - **Room Size:** 26 m² (279 sq ft).
   - **Highlights:** Free WiFi, air conditioning, ensuite bathroom, and sea view.
   - **Child Policy:** Children of any age are welcome. Extra beds available for children aged 3+ at **$35.08 per night**.

2. **Deluxe Room Sea View King Bed (Single Occupancy)**
   - **Price:** Approximately **$865** (₹73,950) for the stay, excluding taxes and charges.
   - **Cancellation Policy:** Free cancellation until **June 8, 2025**.
   - **Meal Plan:** Breakfast included. Lunch and dinner available for an additional **$58** each.
   - **Room Size:** 26 m² (279 sq ft).
   - **Highlights:** Free WiFi, air conditioning, ensuite bathroom, and sea view.
   - **Child Policy:** Similar to the Superior Room, with extra beds for children aged 3+ at **$35.08 per night**.

### General Policies:
- **Cancellation:** Free cancellation is available until **June 8, 2025**. After this date, the first night's cost will be charged if canceled.
- **Prepayment:** A prepayment of the first night's cost is required if canceled within 2 days of arrival.
- **Taxes and Charges:** Additional taxes and fees apply (e.g., **$138** for the Superior Room, **$156** for the Deluxe Room).
- **Child Policy:** Children under 12 stay free when using existing beds. Extra beds and cribs are available for a fee.

### Property Highlights:
- **Amenities:** Free WiFi, airport shuttle, swimming pool, and air conditioning.
- **Room Features:** Sea views, safety deposit boxes, bathrobes, and ensuite bathrooms.
- **Check-in/Check-out:** Early check-in and late check-out may be available upon request.

### Additional Notes:
- Prices are displayed in USD but are converted from INR, so actual charges may vary slightly.
- The hotel offers a mix of European and Indian elegance, with rooms overlooking the Arabian Sea or the Gateway of India.
- Smoking preferences can be specified during booking (non-smoking or smoking rooms available).

This summary provides a clear overview of the booking options, policies, and amenities for travelers considering a stay at this Mumbai hotel.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers planning hotel stays and comparing room options. It retrieves available room types, pricing, and policies for a specific hotel, based on check-in/check-out dates and guest details. Users receive comprehensive details like room size, meal plans, cancellation policies, child fees, and amenities. The hotel ID must be obtained from the SearchHotels or SearchHotelsByCoordinates API.

enhanced_parameters.hotel_id: Unique identifier for the hotel, sourced from searchHotels or searchHotelsByCoordinates.
enhanced_parameters.arrival_date: Check-in date for the hotel stay.
enhanced_parameters.departure_date: Check-out date for the hotel stay.
enhanced_parameters.adults: Number of adult guests (18+ years). Default is 1.
enhanced_parameters.room_qty: Number of rooms required. Default is 1.
enhanced_parameters.location: Geographic location code for the hotel.

policies.description: List of policies applicable to the hotel booking.

content.description: The detailed description of the policy.

class.description: The classification or type of the policy, such as cancellation policy.

refund_during_fc.description: Details about the refund policy during the free cancellation period.

title_details.description: Title details for the refund policy during free cancellation.

translation.description: Translated text indicating the refund policy during free cancellation.

tag.description: Tag identifier for the refund policy clarification.

placeholder_translation.description: Placeholder text for the refund policy during free cancellation.

prepayment.description: Details about the prepayment policy for the booking.

description_details.description: Description details of the prepayment policy.

placeholder_translation.description: Placeholder text describing the prepayment policy.

ages.description: List of ages for which extra beds are applicable

ar_items.description: Age for which extra beds are applicable

private_bathroom_count.description: Number of private bathrooms in the room

room_options.description: List of available room options for booking

ar_items.description: Details of a specific room option

room_type.description: Type of the room (e.g., Superior Room Sea View King Bed)

price.description: Total price for the stay in USD (excluding taxes and charges)

price_local.description: Total price for the stay in local currency (e.g., INR)

prepayment_required.description: Whether prepayment is required after free cancellation period

prepayment_amount.description: Amount to be prepaid if canceled after free cancellation period

meal_plan.description: Details of the meal plan included with the room

lunch_cost.description: Additional cost for lunch in USD

dinner_cost.description: Additional cost for dinner in USD

room_size.description: Size of the room in different units

highlights.description: List of key features or amenities of the room

ar_items.description: A specific highlight (e.g., Free WiFi, sea view)

child_policy.description: Policy regarding children staying in the room

children_welcome.description: Whether children of any age are welcome

extra_bed_age_limit.description: Minimum age for children requiring extra beds

extra_bed_cost.description: Cost per night for an extra bed

children_stay_free.description: Whether children under a certain age stay free

free_stay_age_limit.description: Maximum age for children to stay free

general_policies.description: General policies applicable to all room bookings

prepayment_required.description: Whether prepayment is required after free cancellation period

prepayment_amount.description: Amount to be prepaid if canceled after free cancellation period

taxes_and_charges.description: Details about additional taxes and fees

tax_amount.description: Approximate additional tax amount in USD

child_policy.description: General child policy for the property

children_stay_free.description: Whether children under a certain age stay free

free_stay_age_limit.description: Maximum age for children to stay free

extra_beds_available.description: Whether extra beds are available for children

cribs_available.description: Whether cribs are available for infants

property_highlights.description: Key features and amenities of the property

amenities.description: List of general amenities available at the property

ar_items.description: A specific amenity (e.g., Free WiFi, swimming pool)

room_features.description: List of common features in the rooms

ar_items.description: A specific room feature (e.g., sea views, safety deposit boxes)

early_check_in.description: Whether early check-in is available upon request

late_check_out.description: Whether late check-out is available upon request

currency_conversion.description: Note about prices being displayed in USD but converted from local currency

property_style.description: Description of the property's style or theme

total_extra_bed_price.description: Total price for all extra beds in the booking currency.

children.description: Number of children included in the booking.

adults.description: Number of adults included in the booking.

number_of_extra_beds_for_children.description: Number of extra beds requested for children.

extra_babycots_price.description: Price for extra baby cots in the booking currency.

extra_beds_for_adults_price.description: Price for extra beds for adults in the booking currency.

babies.description: Number of babies included in the booking.

number_of_extra_beds_for_adults.description: Number of extra beds requested for adults.

number_of_extra_beds_and_babycots_total.description: Total number of extra beds and baby cots requested.

extra_beds_for_children_price_in_hotel_c.description: Price for extra beds for children in the hotel's local currency.

extra_beds_for_adults_price_in_hotel_cur.description: Price for extra beds for adults in the hotel's local currency.

number_of_extra_babycots.description: Number of extra baby cots requested.

block_id.description: Unique identifier for the room block or booking.

extra_beds_for_children_price.description: Price for extra beds for children in the booking currency.

total_extra_bed_price_in_hotel_currency.description: Total price for all extra beds in the hotel's local currency.

extra_babycots_price_in_hotel_currency.description: Price for extra baby cots in the hotel's local currency.

qualifies_for_no_cc_reservation.description: Indicates whether the reservation qualifies for no credit card requirement (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

average_room_size_for_ufi_m2.description: Average room size in square meters for the hotel.

currency_code.description: Currency code used for pricing (e.g., INR for Indian Rupees).

cheapest_avail_price_eur.description: Cheapest available room price in Euros.

cvc_required.description: Indicates whether a CVC code is required for booking (1 = Yes, 0 = No).

b_legal_use_neutral_color_for_persuasion.description: Flag for legal UI color usage (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

max_rooms_in_reservation.description: Maximum number of rooms allowed in a single reservation.

use_new_bui_icon_highlight.description: Flag indicating whether to use new BUI icon highlighting (1 = Yes, 0 = No).

total_blocks.description: Total number of room blocks available for booking.

is_exclusive.description: Indicates if the property is exclusive (null = Not specified).

tax_exceptions.description: List of tax exceptions (empty if none).

duplicate_rates_removed.description: Indicates if duplicate rates were removed (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

soldout_rooms.description: List of sold-out room types (empty if none).

is_cpv2_property.description: Indicates if the property is CPV2-compliant (1 = Yes, 0 = No).

cc_required.description: Indicates if a credit card is required for booking (1 = Yes, 0 = No).

address_required.description: Indicates if an address is required for booking (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

recommended_block_title.description: Title for the recommended room block (e.g., 'Recommended for 1 adult').

last_matching_block_index.description: Index of the last matching room block (-1 if none).

is_tpi_exclusive_property.description: Indicates if the property is TPI-exclusive (0 = No, 1 = Yes).
